member.name: T:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameChatMessageReceivedEventArgs
member.summary: Contains the event arguments for the MessageReceived event. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.

member.name: P:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameChatMessageReceivedEventArgs.AppDisplayName
member.summary: The display name for the app that triggered the event. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.
member.returns: The display name for the app that triggered the event.

member.name: P:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameChatMessageReceivedEventArgs.AppId
member.summary: The **Package Family Name (PFN)** of the app that triggered the event. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.
member.returns: The **Package Family Name (PFN)** of the app that triggered the event. Use this to identify the app.

member.name: P:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameChatMessageReceivedEventArgs.Message
member.summary: The contents of the message. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.

member.name: P:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameChatMessageReceivedEventArgs.Origin
member.summary: The origin of the message (voice or text). This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.
member.returns: The origin of the message (voice or text).

member.name: P:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameChatMessageReceivedEventArgs.SenderName
member.summary: The sender of the message (the *sender* parameter passed to the GameChatOverlay.AddMessage method). This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.
member.returns: The sender of the message (the *sender* parameter passed to the GameChatOverlay.AddMessage method).

member.name: T:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameChatOverlayMessageSource
member.summary: Provides an event that is raised every time the game chat receives a message, as well as a method to set the delay before the game chat overlay closes after receiving a message. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.

member.name: M:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameChatOverlayMessageSource.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for the **GameChatOverlayMessageSource** class. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.

member.name: E:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameChatOverlayMessageSource.MessageReceived
member.summary: Event raised every time a message is received. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.

member.name: M:Windows.Gaming.UI.GameChatOverlayMessageSource.SetDelayBeforeClosingAfterMessageReceived(Windows.Foundation.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the delay before the game chat overlay closes after receiving a message. This API is not available to all apps. Unless your developer account is specially provisioned by Microsoft, your app cannot use this API.
member.param: The delay before the game chat overlay closes.
